name: MyBMW
0:
”Alexa, open B.M.W.”
”Alexa, ask B. M. W. is my car safe.”
”Alexa, tell B.M.W. to check my battery status.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: b. m. w.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Alexa, your BMW is literally coming home. Control remote functions of your vehicle using your favourite assistant. The My BMW skill is optimised for 2014 BMW models and later, and supports interaction on all Amazon Echo devices.
Once enabled, you can ask questions or give commands such as:

Precondition your BMW
"Alexa, ask BMW to activate the climate control"

Start your engine

"Alexa, ask BMW to start my car"

Unlock your BMW
"Alexa, ask BMW to unlock my vehicle"

Lock your BMW
"Alexa, ask BMW to lock my car"

Flash the lights
"Alexa, ask BMW to flash the lights"

Honk your BMW's horn
"Alexa, ask BMW to honk the horn"

Check if your BMW is safe
"Alexa, ask BMW if my car is safe"
"Alexa, ask BMW if my doors are locked"
"Alexa, ask BMW if my windows are closed"
"Alexa, ask BMW if my trunk is open"
"Alexa, ask BMW if my sunroof is closed"

Check your BMW's remaining range
"Alexa, ask BMW what's my range"

Check your BMW's charging status
"Alexa, ask BMW what is my charging status"

Change your selected BMW

"Alexa, ask BMW to change cars"


To setup this skill:
1. Enable the My BMW skill
2. Log in to your BMW account through the Alexa app or website
3. Set a PIN in your My BMW mobile app on the profile tab under Alexa - Alexa skill
4. To get help, just ask "Alexa, ask BMW for help"


Notes:
- This function can only be used with one BMW vehicle per BMW account
- Alexa will send remote service commands to your vehicle. Remote services are not available while your vehicle is in motion or when car location services are interrupted.
- To contact BMW customer support, please visit the ""About and Contact"" page in the My BMW app to locate the correct phone number for your country.
